useCase.name: Piedra, Papel, Tijera Game
useCase.description: As a user, I want to play the game "Piedra, Papel, Tijera" on this platform.

preconditions.precondition: The game platform should be loaded and accessible.

useCase.trigger: User selects "Un Jugador" or "Dos Jugadores" button.

mainSequence.step: Render HomeRock component with the title "Piedra, Papel, Tijera". (Actor: User)
User clicks the "Un Jugador" button. (Actor: User)
Set the game mode to 'single'. (Actor: GameMode)
User clicks the "Dos Jugadores" button. (Actor: User)
Set the game mode to 'multi'. (Actor: GameMode)
User clicks the "Back to Home" button. (Actor: User)
Return to the Home screen. (Actor: HomeRock)
